Summary: It was Red with fire or light underneath it going in a straight format.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ladysmith
There were no other sightings in Ladysmith on or around July 16th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was smoking a cig outside the place i'm staying at and i was looking at the sky kinda and seen a red thing move in the sky and thought it was weird to see something like that in my area so i ran and got the person i live with and he came out and the object was moving straight with fire\light underneath it going in and out then it got to far away and couldn't see what it was. we believed that it was a ufo. oh and my phone died afterwards for a minute when it had a full battery.
